Who: RODIMUS PRIME, LEGACY, Tuscon, Nightshift, Darkhawk, Perceptor,
Rat Trap, Quickstride
Location: Black Fortress - Hole/chamber beneath hallway


> "Why do you presume that I'll help you?"said dryly the Predacon

Rodimus cocked his head as if the answer was obvious, "Because you are
stuck down here with us." Rodimus said as he glanced back up at the
top of the hole. "You saw how your boss fired down here a few moments
ago." Rodimus pointed ujp with his free hand to show some of the
battle scars the wall had taken. "If he starts firing at us like he
did before, then he might bring the whole room in on us."

Rodimus fixed his gaze on Perceptor as he grips his weapon with both
hands again, "and no matter what you think you want to do, if that
happens you will be just as dead as we are."

Rodimus waited, his weapon still drawn and pointed at Perceptor.

(TAG)

Preston
